sentences.sentence: Thus individual preference may be followed in choice of immobilisation method.
sentences.translation: 因此应对病人采用个体化的制动方式选择。

sentences.sentence: Limb immobilisation led to more cautious rural and urban driving, with less adjustment of speed and lateral road position than when unrestricted.
sentences.translation: 与自由驾驶相比，上肢制动使得乡村和城市路段上的驾驶过程更加小心，对于速度和横向移位的调整能力减弱。

sentences.sentence: Upper-limb immobilisation appears to have little effect on the ability to drive a car unchallenged, but to adversely affect responses to routine hazards.
sentences.translation: 上肢制动似乎对普通情况下的驾驶过程影响不大，而对常见危险状况下的反应能力却有着明显不利的影响。
